00081       class init_visitor :public CycleDetector {
00082       public:
00086        explicit init_visitor(TICK final)
00087          :m_final(final) {}
00092        init_visitor(init_visitor const &other)
00093          :CycleDetector(other), m_final(other.m_final) {}
00095        virtual ~init_visitor() {}
00096 
00112        void finish_vertex(graph::reactor_id r, graph const &g) {
00113          if( is_valid(r,g) ) {
00114            if( !r->initialize(m_final) ) {
00115              g.isolate(r);
00116            }
00117          }
00118        }
00119       protected:
00125        TICK m_final;
00126 
00127       };
00128 
00151       class sync_scheduller :public CycleDetector {
00152       public:
00162        typedef std::list<graph::reactor_id> reactor_queue;
00163 
00177        explicit sync_scheduller(reactor_queue &sync_order)
00178          :m_sync(&sync_order) {}
00185        sync_scheduller(sync_scheduller const &other)
00186          :CycleDetector(other), m_sync(other.m_sync) {}
00188        virtual ~sync_scheduller() {}
00189 
00199        void discover_vertex(graph::reactor_id r, graph const &g) {
00200          // First encounter with r :
00201          //   - inform him that a new tick has started
00202          //        this will result on dispatching its goals if possible
00203          if( is_valid(r,g) )
00204            if( !r->newTick() )
00205               g.isolate(r);
00206        }
00207 
00218        void finish_vertex(graph::reactor_id r, graph const &g) {
00219          // Completed all the vertex below :
00220          //   - this the next candidate to be synchronized
00221          if( is_valid(r,g) )
00222            m_sync->push_back(r);
00223        }
00224 
00225       private:
00227        reactor_queue               *m_sync;
00228 
00229        sync_scheduller(); // no code in purpose
00230       };
00231 
00232       class cycle_checker : public boost::default_dfs_visitor
00233       {
00234           public:
00235             enum Cycle_Type { internal, external };
00236             struct has_cycle
00237             {
00238                 has_cycle(bool value, std::string msg="")
00239                 :cycle(value), message(msg) {};
00240                 bool cycle;
00241                 std::string message;
00242             };
00243 
00244             cycle_checker(graph::reactor_id const& goal, graph::reactor_id const& root, Cycle_Type type, utils::Symbol name="" )
00245                 : root(root), node(goal), name(name), timelineType(type) {};
00246 
00247             void discover_vertex(graph::reactor_id r, graph const &g)
00248             {
00249                 if(r==graph::null_reactor())
00250                     return;
00251 
00252                 if(timelineType==internal)
00253                 {
00254                     std::pair< TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::external_iterator,
00255                                 TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::external_iterator > edges = boost::out_edges(r, g);
00256                     for(TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::external_iterator temp = edges.first; temp!=edges.second; ++temp)
00257                     {
00258                         if(temp->name()==name)
00259                         {
00260                             std::stringstream msg;
00261                             msg<<"Found a potential cycle going from ";
00262                             for(std::list<utils::Symbol>::iterator it = path.begin(); it!=path.end(); it++)
00263                             {
00264                                 msg<<"("<<*it<<")->";
00265                             }
00266                             msg<<"("<<name<<")";
00267                             throw has_cycle(true, msg.str());
00268                         }
00269                     }
00270                 }
00271             }
00272 
00273             void tree_edge(graph::relation_type const & rel, graph const &g)
00274             {
00275                 //Adding reactor name to list to store the path to the potential cycle
00276                 path.push_back(rel->name());
00277             }
00278 
00279             void examine_edge(graph::relation_type const & rel, graph const &g)
00280             {
00281                 if(timelineType==external)
00282                 {
00283                     if(boost::target(rel, g)==node)
00284                     {
00285                         std::stringstream msg;
00286                         msg<<"Found a potential cycle going from ("<<name<<")->";
00287                         for(std::list<utils::Symbol>::iterator it = path.begin(); it!=path.end(); it++)
00288                         {
00289                             msg<<"("<<*it<<")->";
00290                         }
00291                         msg<<"("<<rel->name()<<")";
00292                         throw has_cycle(true, msg.str());
00293                     }
00294                 }
00295             }
00296 
00297             void finish_vertex(graph::reactor_id r, graph const &g)
00298             {
00299                 switch(timelineType)
00300                 {
00301                     case external :
00302                         if(r==root)
00303                         {
00304                             throw has_cycle(false);
00305                         }
00306                         break;
00307                     case internal :
00308                         if(r==root)
00309                         {
00310                             throw has_cycle(false);
00311                         }
00312                         break;
00313                     default :
00314                         throw has_cycle(false); // Should never happen
00315                 }
00316                 //Taking off the last reactor added to the path
00317                 path.pop_back();
00318             }
00319 
00320           private:
00321             graph::reactor_id const& root;
00322             graph::reactor_id const& node;
00323             utils::Symbol name;
00324             std::list<utils::Symbol> path;
00325             Cycle_Type timelineType;
00326       };
00327 
00328 
00329     }
00330   }
00331 }

00342 TICK Agent::initialTick(Clock *clk) {
00343   return (NULL==clk)?0:clk->initialTick();
00344 }

00348 Agent::Agent(Symbol const &name, TICK final, Clock *clk)
00349   :graph(name, initialTick(clk)),
00350    m_clock(clk), m_finalTick(final) {
00351   m_proxy = new AgentProxy(*this);
00352   add_reactor(m_proxy);

00355 Agent::Agent(std::string const &file_name, Clock *clk)
00356   :m_clock(clk) {
00357   updateTick(initialTick(m_clock));
00358   m_proxy = new AgentProxy(*this);
00359   add_reactor(m_proxy);
00360   try {
00361     loadConf(file_name);
00362   } catch(TREX::utils::Exception const &e) {
00363     syslog("ERROR")<<"Exception caught while loading "<<file_name<<":\n"
00364                  <<e;
00365     throw;
00366   } catch(std::exception const &se) {
00367     syslog("ERROR")<<"C++ exception caught while loading "
00368                  <<file_name<<":\n"
00369                  <<se.what();
00370     throw;
00371   } catch(...) {
00372     syslog("ERROR")<<"Unknown exception caught while loading "
00373                  <<file_name;
00374     throw;
00375   }
00376 }

00379   :m_clock(clk) {
00380   updateTick(initialTick(m_clock));
00381   m_proxy = new AgentProxy(*this);
00382   add_reactor(m_proxy);

00384     loadConf(conf);
00385   } catch(TREX::utils::Exception const &e) {
00386     syslog("ERROR")<<"Exception caught while loading XML:\n"
00387                  <<e;
00388     throw;
00389   } catch(std::exception const &se) {
00390     syslog("ERROR")<<"C++ exception caught while loading XML:\n"
00391                  <<se.what();
00392     throw;
00393   } catch(...) {
00394     syslog("ERROR")<<"Unknown exception caught while loading XML";
00395     throw;
00396   }

00400 Agent::~Agent() {
00401   m_proxy = NULL;
00402   clear();
00403   if( NULL!=m_clock )
00404     delete m_clock;
00405 }

00407 // observers :

00409 bool Agent::missionCompleted() {
00410   if( count_reactors()<=1 ) {
00411     // If there's only one reactor left it is probably
00412     // my AgentProxy => no real reactor available
00413     syslog()<<"No reactor left.";
00414     return true;
00415   }
00416   return getCurrentTick()>m_finalTick;
00417 }
00418 
00419 void Agent::internal_check(reactor_id r,
00420                         TREX::transaction::details::timeline const &tl) {
00421     if(index(r)==count_reactors()) return;
00422     if(tl.owned())
00423     {
00424         std::stringstream msg;
00425         msg <<"Timeline "<<tl.name()<<" already owned by "<<tl.owner().getName();
00426         throw timeline_failure(r, msg.str());
00427     }
00428 
00429     details::cycle_checker checkInternal(r, r, details::cycle_checker::internal, tl.name());
00430     try {
00431         boost::depth_first_search(me(), boost::visitor(checkInternal).root_vertex(r));
00432     } catch (details::cycle_checker::has_cycle check) {
00433         if(check.cycle)
00434         {
00435             throw timeline_failure(r, check.message);
00436             // throw timeline_failure(...) <= indicate to reactor_graph that
00437             //this connection is not allowed
00438         }
00439     }
00440 }
00441 
00442 void Agent::external_check(reactor_id r,
00443                         TREX::transaction::details::timeline const &tl) {
00444     if(index(r)==count_reactors()) return;
00445     if(tl.owned())
00446     {
00447         details::cycle_checker checkExternal(r, &(tl.owner()), details::cycle_checker::external, tl.name());
00448         try {
00449         boost::depth_first_search(me(), boost::visitor(checkExternal).root_vertex(&(tl.owner())));
00450         } catch (details::cycle_checker::has_cycle check) {
00451             if(check.cycle)
00452             {
00453                 throw timeline_failure(r, check.message);
00454                 //throw timeline_failure(...) <= indicate to reactor_graph that
00455                 //this connection is not allowed
00456             }
00457         }
00458     }
00459 }

00465 bool Agent::setClock(Clock *clock) {
00466   if( NULL==m_clock ) {
00467     m_clock = clock;
00468     updateTick(initialTick(m_clock));
00469     return true;
00470   } else {
00471     delete clock;
00472     return false;
00473   }
00474 }

00476 void Agent::loadPlugin(boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type &pg) {
00477   Symbol name = parse_attr<Symbol>(pg, "name");
00478   m_pg->load(name);
00479 }

00481 void Agent::loadConf(boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type &config) {
00482   if( !is_tag(config, "Agent") )
00483     throw XmlError(config, "Not an Agent node");
00484   // Extract attributes
00485   try {
00486     Symbol name(parse_attr<std::string>(config, "name"));
00487     if( name.empty() )
00488       throw XmlError(config, "Agent name is empty.");
00489     set_name(name);
00490     m_finalTick = parse_attr<TICK>(config, "finalTick");
00491     if( m_finalTick<=0 )
00492       throw XmlError(config, "agent life time should be greater than 0");
00493   } catch(bad_string_cast const &e) {
00494     throw XmlError(config, e.what());
00495   }
00496   // Populate with external configuration
00497   ext_xml(config.second, "config");
00498 
00499 
00500   // Now iterate through the sub-tags
00501   if( config.second.empty() )
00502     throw XmlError(config, "Agent node does not have sub nodes.");
00503   boost::property_tree::ptree::assoc_iterator i, last;
00504 
00505   // First load the plugins :
00506   syslog()<<"Loading plug-ins...";
00507   boost::tie(i, last) = config.second.equal_range("Plugin");
00508   for( ; last!=i; ++i )
00509     loadPlugin(*i);
00510 
00511   // Look for A clock : Note only the first clock found is used
00512   if( NULL==m_clock ) {
00513     SingletonUse<Clock::xml_factory> clk_f;
00514     boost::property_tree::ptree::iterator c = config.second.begin();
00515 
00516     clk_f->iter_produce(c, config.second.end(), m_clock);
00517   }
00518   // List the reactors available for helping the user :
00519   SingletonUse<xml_factory> reactor_f;
00520 
00521   // First look for the reactor types available
00522   std::list<Symbol> reactors_types;
00523 
00524   reactor_f->getIds(reactors_types);
00525   if( reactors_types.empty() ) {
00526     syslog("ERROR")<<"No reactor type available.";
00527   } else {
00528     // Display the list of reactor types
00529     std::ostringstream oss;
00530 
00531     while( !reactors_types.empty() ) {
00532       oss<<"\n\t- "<<reactors_types.front();
00533       reactors_types.pop_front();
00534     }
00535     syslog()<<"Loading reactors; available reactor types are :"<<oss.str();
00536 
00537     add_reactors(config.second);
00538   }
00539 
00540   // Now load and post the goals
00541   syslog()<<"load initial goals of the agent";
00542   sendRequests(config.second);
00543 }
00544 
00545 void Agent::loadConf(std::string const &file_name) {
00546   bool found;
00547   std::string name = manager().use(file_name, found);
00548   if( !found ) {
00549     name = manager().use(file_name+".cfg", found);
00550     if( !found )
00551       throw ErrnoExcept("Unable to locate "+file_name);
00552   }
00553   boost::property_tree::ptree agent;
00554   read_xml(name, agent, xml::no_comments|xml::trim_whitespace);
00555 
00556   if( agent.empty() )
00557     throw TREX::utils::Exception(std::string("Configuration file : \"")+
00558                              file_name+"\" is empty.");
00559   if( agent.size()!=1 )
00560     throw TREX::utils::Exception(std::string("Configuration file : \"")+
00561                              file_name+"\" have multiple roots.");
00562   loadConf(agent.front());
00563 }
00564 
00565 void Agent::initComplete() {
00566   if( getName().empty() )
00567     throw AgentException(*this, "Agent has no name :"
00568                       " You probably forgot to initialize it.");
00569   if( NULL==m_clock )
00570     throw AgentException(*this, "Agent is not connected to a clock");
00571   // Complete the init for the reactors and check that there's no cycle
00572   details::init_visitor init(m_finalTick);
00573   boost::depth_first_search(me(), boost::visitor(init));
00574   size_t n_failed = cleanup();
00575   if( n_failed>0 )
00576     syslog("WARN")<<n_failed<<" reactors failed to initialize.";
00577 
00578   // Check for missing timelines
00579   for(timeline_iterator it=timeline_begin(); timeline_end()!=it; ++it)
00580     if( !(*it)->owned() )
00581       syslog("WARN")<<"Timeline \""<<(*it)->name()<<"\" has no owner.";
00582 
00583 
00584   // Create initial graph file
00585   LogManager::path_type graph_dot = manager().file_name("reactors.dot");
00586   std::ofstream dotf(graph_dot.c_str());
00587 
00588   graph_names_writer gn;
00589   boost::write_graphviz(dotf, me(), gn, gn);
00590   syslog()<<"Initial graph logged in \"reactors.dot\".";
00591 
00592 
00593   // start the clock
00594   m_clock->doStart();
00595   syslog("START")<<"\t=========================================================";
00596 }
00597 
00598 void Agent::run() {
00599   initComplete();
00600   while( doNext() );
00601   syslog()<<"Mission completed."<<std::endl;
00602 }
00603 
00604 
00605 void Agent::synchronize() {
00606   details::sync_scheduller::reactor_queue queue;
00607   details::sync_scheduller sync(queue);
00608   m_edf.clear(); // Make sure that there's no one left in the schedulling
00609   m_idle.clear();
00610   bool update = false;
00611 
00612   // Identify synchronization order while notifying of the new tick
00613   boost::depth_first_search(me(), boost::visitor(sync));
00614   size_t n_failed = cleanup();
00615   if( n_failed>0 )
00616     syslog("WARN")<<n_failed<<" reactors failed to start tick "<<getCurrentTick();
00617   // Execute synchronization
00618   //  - could be done with a dfs but we choose for now to do it using the
00619   //  output list of sync_scheduller to avoid a potentially costfull graph
00620   //  exploration.
00621   while( !queue.empty() ) {
00622     reactor_id r = queue.front();
00623     queue.pop_front();        
00624     // synchronization
00625     if( r->doSynchronize() ) {
00626       double wr = r->workRatio();
00627 
00628       if( !std::isnan(wr) ) {
00629        // this reactor has deliberation :
00630        //   - add it to the edf scheduler
00631        m_edf.insert(std::make_pair(wr, r));
00632       } else 
00633         m_idle.push_front(r);
00634     } else {
00635       // r failed => kill the reactor
00636       kill_reactor(r);
00637       update = true;
00638     }
00639   }
00640   if( update ) {
00641     // Create new graph file
00642     std::ostringstream name;
00643     name<<"reactors."<<getCurrentTick()<<".dot";
00644     
00645     LogManager::path_type graph_dot = manager().file_name(name.str());
00646     std::ofstream dotf(graph_dot.c_str());
00647     
00648     graph_names_writer gn;
00649     boost::write_graphviz(dotf, me(), gn, gn);
00650     syslog()<<"New graph logged in \""<<name.str()<<"\".";    
00651   }
00652 }
00653 
00654 bool Agent::executeReactor() {
00655   if( m_edf.empty() )
00656     return false;
00657   else {
00658     double wr;
00659     reactor_id r;
00660 
00661     boost::tie(wr, r) = *(m_edf.begin());
00662     // syslog("step")<<"Executing reactor "<<r->getName()<<" (wr="<<wr<<")";
00663     m_edf.erase(m_edf.begin());
00664     m_idle.push_back(r);
00665     try {
00666       r->step();
00667       
00668       std::list<reactor_id>::iterator i = m_idle.begin();
00669       
00670       while( m_idle.end()!=i ) {
00671         // Check if the reactor is still valid 
00672         if( is_member(*i) ) {
00673           wr = r->workRatio();
00674           if( !std::isnan(wr) ) {
00675             m_edf.insert(std::make_pair(wr, r));
00676             i = m_idle.erase(i);
00677           } else 
00678             ++i;
00679         } else 
00680           i = m_idle.erase(i);
00681       }
00682     } catch(Exception const &e) {
00683       syslog("WARN")<<"Exception caught while executing reactor step:\n"<<e;
00684     } catch(std::exception const &se) {
00685       syslog("WARN")<<"C++ exception caught while executing reactor step:\n"<<se.what();      
00686     } catch(...) {
00687       syslog("WARN")<<"Unknown exception caught while executing reactor step.";            
00688     }
00689     return !m_edf.empty();
00690   }
00691 }
00692 
00693 bool Agent::doNext() {
00694   if( missionCompleted() ) {
00695     if( empty() )
00696       syslog()<<"No more reactor active.";
00697     syslog("END")<<"\t=========================================================";
00698     return false;
00699   }
00700   synchronize();
00701 
00702   while( m_clock->getNextTick()==getCurrentTick() && executeReactor() );
00703   while( m_clock->getNextTick()==getCurrentTick() )
00704     m_clock->sleep();
00705 
00706   updateTick(m_clock->getNextTick());
00707 
00708   return true;
00709 }
00710 
00711 void Agent::sendRequest(goal_id const &g) {
00712   if( !has_timeline(g->object()) )
00713     syslog("WARN")<<"Posting goal on a unknnown timeline \""<<g->object()<<"\".";
00714   m_proxy->postRequest(g);
00715 }
00716 
00717 size_t Agent::sendRequests(boost::property_tree::ptree &g) {
00718   size_t ret = 0;
00719   boost::property_tree::ptree::assoc_iterator i, last;
00720   boost::tie(i, last) = g.equal_range("Goal");
00721   if( last==i )
00722     syslog("WARN")<<"No goal found in this file";
00723   else {
00724     for(; last!=i; ++i) {
00725       sendRequest(*i);
00726       ++ret;
00727     }
00728     syslog()<<ret<<" goal"<<(ret>1?"s":"")<<" loaded.";
00729   }
00730   return ret;
00731 }
